creator: icq@cauni.de
text:
in version 1.9.1 the http proxy server didn't crashed, when sending
checkbox-values with e.g. value=männlich.
Now, in Version 2.0.0 the server crashes always.

here is a sample word of a saved testplan *.jmx from jemter.
"abgekürzt"

jmeter version 1.9.1
abgekÃ¼rzter

jmeter version 2.0.0
abgekï¿½rzter

It seems so, that the version 2.0.0 does anything wrong ?? I didn't
understand this problem, because both version do a UTF-8 encoding, so I
think, both words must be encoded of the same way.

On site http://jmeter.cauni.de is a test website. "männlich" is the critical 
value.

More information see on the jmeter mailing list.

Best regards,
Carsten

creator: icq@cauni.de
